TempAccount.tt: Select default Account to assign device to

TempApplication.pr: Default application name using the devices (optional)
TempApplication.tt: Default application name using the devices (optional)

TempStatus.tt: Select default status of device. Device isn't active until enabled.

TempType.tt: Context of device data (eg. temperature sensor, web service weather forecast)

TempModels.tt: Select existing model template (for edit) or enter template name (for new)

TempBranch.tt: Default organisational branch name for device (optional)

DevStatus.tt: Device status. Must be enabled for incoming data to be accepted

DevSerial.tt: Enter unique ID to identify incoming data

DevName.tt: Friendly name or alias for device

DevBranch.tt: Organisation branch where the device is located

DevDepartment.tt: Organisation department where the device is located

a.invalid message: Data input is invalid for an ICCID, please enter 18 to 22 digits starting with 89.
